patthana15.51:1.1: Anupādinnaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.51:2.1: Anupādinnaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ ekaṁyeva paccayavasena.)
